Utilize alternative devices, such as tablets or smartphones, to access digital resources and complete tasks.
Conduct research by visiting local libraries or other physical archives to find necessary information.
Collaborate with others in the office or study area to complete tasks or share resources.
Reach out to colleagues or peers who have access to functioning computers or cloud-based resources to assist with work or studies.
